scripts.setup:reset:hardcoded:prod: npm run env:setup:prod && npm run heroku:database:reset && pushd backend && npm run setup:reset:hardcoded:prod && popd
scripts.setup:reset:hardcoded:local: npm run env:setup:local && pushd backend && npm run setup:reset:hardcoded:local && popd
scripts.env:setup:prod: pushd backend && npm run env:refresh:prod && popd && pushd mobile && npm run env:refresh:prod && popd && echo OK
scripts.env:setup:local: pushd backend && npm run env:refresh:local && popd && pushd mobile && npm run env:refresh:local && popd && echo OK
scripts.heroku:backend:deploy: git subtree push --prefix backend heroku master
scripts.heroku:database:copy_local_to_cloud: pushd backend && npm run database:store && popd && node scripts/replace_owner_id_db_dump.js && heroku pg:psql postgresql-sinuous-01484 --app wymianka < backend/scripts/database_remove_tables.sql && heroku pg:psql postgresql-sinuous-01484 --app wymianka < backend/scripts/database_dump.sql
